# Aurora-X Security Testing Requirements
# Generated by Aurora autonomous system
# Purpose: Tools for security analysis, vulnerability scanning, and code quality

# Security Scanning
bandit==1.7.5                    # Python AST-based security linter
safety==2.3.5                    # Dependency vulnerability scanner
pip-audit==2.6.1                 # Audit Python packages for vulnerabilities

# Code Quality & Security Analysis
pylint==3.0.2                    # Python code analysis
flake8==6.1.0                    # Style guide enforcement
flake8-bandit==4.1.1             # Bandit integration for Flake8
pyre-check==0.9.18               # Type checker with security focus

# Secrets Detection
detect-secrets==1.5.0            # Prevent secrets in code
truffleHog==2.2.1                # Find secrets in git history (fixed version)

# Dependency Management
pipdeptree==2.13.1               # Dependency tree visualization
pip-licenses==4.3.3              # License checker

# SAST (Static Application Security Testing)
semgrep==1.45.0                  # Lightweight SAST tool

# Web Security (for API testing)
requests==2.31.0                 # HTTP library
urllib3==2.1.0                   # HTTP client

# Additional Security Tools
cryptography==41.0.7             # Cryptographic recipes and primitives
PyJWT==2.8.0                     # JSON Web Token implementation
bcrypt==4.1.1                    # Password hashing
